Texts.Eng: A Keffrider is a servant of the people first and foremost, always remember that! You've earned the respect of your tenants, and mine with it. Now, you must prove your strength, for a Keffrider must be able to protect his kin.

How would you like to become a Keffrider, Captain? If you prove yourself worthy of the title I'll get the Council to grant you your ^orange;Keffrider's license^white;! ^green;Earn the respect of Avikan tenants ^white;and show me ^orange;five Avikan Gifts^white;, and we'll get this started!
